definitions: the quality or characteristic of having no sexual feelings or desires

examples.text: the show has regularly confronted prejudice around homosexuality and asexuality

shortDefinitions: quality or characteristic of having no sexual feelings

definitions: the quality of reproducing without the fusion of gametes

examples.text: asexuality is not always a negative factor that decreases the genetic diversity of populations

shortDefinitions: quality of reproducing without fusion of gametes

definitions: the state of having no sex or sexual organs

examples.text: nature has caused a reversion to a simpler asexuality

shortDefinitions: state of having no sex or sexual organs
